400.description: We are sorry but your request contains bad syntax and cannot be fulfilled

401.description: We are sorry but you are not authorized to access this page

403.description: We are sorry but you do not have permission to access this page

404.description: We are sorry but the page you are looking for was not found

500.description: We are sorry but our server encountered an internal error

503.description: We are sorry but our service is currently not available

maintenance.description: Sorry for the inconvenience but we’re performing some maintenance at the moment. We’ll be back online shortly!
